sourcesContent:
let authState = {
    isLoggedin: false,
    name: "",
    email: "",
    mobile: "",
    isRegistered: false
}

export function authReducer(state = authState, action) {
    console.log("auth", action)
    let stateCopy = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(state))
    switch (action.type) {
        case "Login":
            stateCopy.isLoggedin = true
            stateCopy.name = action.type.name
            stateCopy.email = action.type.email
            stateCopy.mobile = action.type.mobile
            return stateCopy
        case "SignUp":
            console.log("signup case", stateCopy)
            stateCopy.isRegistered = true
            stateCopy.name = action.type.name
            stateCopy.email = action.type.email
            stateCopy.mobile = action.type.mobile
            return stateCopy
        default:
            return stateCopy
    }
}
